0.3.name: wordpress/ceceppa-multilingua
0.3.description:
I create Ceceppa Multilingua to let Wordpress have an easy to use interface for managing a fully multilingual web site. With "Ceceppa Multilingua" you can write your posts and pages in multiple language. Here are some features:

Features

  • Separated posts and pages for each languages, so you can use different SEO and url for each languages.
  • Translate your theme (Plugin will generate the .mo file for wordpress)
  • URLs pretty and SEO-friendly. ?lang=en, /en/foo/ or en.yoursite.com
  • Different menu for each language.
  • Translate widget's title.
  • Translate Site Title / Tagline
  • One-Click-Switching between the languages
  • One-Click-Switching between the translations
  • Category link translation
  • Add flags to menu
  • Group/Ungroup comments for each post's languages.
  • Show notice when the post/page/category that user is viewing is available, based on the information provided by the browser

  • Different menu for each language.

  • Translate Site Title / Tagline
  • One-Click-Switching between the languages
  • One-Click-Switching between the translations

  • Group/Ungroup comments for each post's languages.

1.0.0.name: wordpress/ceceppa-multilingua
1.0.0.description:
I create Ceceppa Multilingua to let Wordpress have an easy to use interface for managing a fully multilingual web site. With "Ceceppa Multilingua" you can write your posts and pages in multiple language. Here are some features:

Features

  • Separated posts and pages for each languages, so you can use different SEO and url for each languages.
  • Translate your theme (Plugin will generate the .mo file for wordpress)
  • URLs pretty and SEO-friendly. ?lang=en, /en/foo/ or en.yoursite.com
  • Different menu for each language.
  • Translate widget's title.
  • Translate Site Title / Tagline
  • One-Click-Switching between the languages
  • One-Click-Switching between the translations
  • Category link translation
  • Add flags to menu
  • Group/Ungroup comments for each post's languages.
  • Show notice when the post/page/category that user is viewing is available, based on the information provided by the browser

  • Show notice when the post/page/category that user is viewing is available, based on the information provided by the browser

1.2.4.name: wordpress/ceceppa-multilingua
1.2.4.description:
I create Ceceppa Multilingua to let Wordpress have an easy to use interface for managing a fully multilingual web site. With "Ceceppa Multilingua" you can write your posts and pages in multiple language. Here are some features:

Features

  • Separated posts and pages for each languages, so you can use different SEO and url for each languages.
  • Translate your theme (Plugin will generate the .mo file for wordpress)
  • URLs pretty and SEO-friendly. ?lang=en, /en/foo/ or en.yoursite.com
  • Different menu for each language.
  • Translate widget's title.
  • Translate Site Title / Tagline
  • One-Click-Switching between the languages
  • One-Click-Switching between the translations
  • Category link translation
  • Add flags to menu
  • Group/Ungroup comments for each post's languages.
  • Show notice when the post/page/category that user is viewing is available, based on the information provided by the browser
